synopsis.text: Zeon Zum Deikun's untimely demise sets the stage for a poignant tale of two siblings, Char Aznable and Sayla Mass, in "Kidou Senshi Gundam: The Origin." Known as the 'Red Comet' for his exceptional piloting skills, Char's journey unfolds alongside his sister's against the backdrop of escalating political tensions and technological advancements. The Zabi family's power grab in Side 3 and the subsequent formation of the Principality of Zeon mark the beginning of a new era, one filled with the emergence of legendary Zeon pilots like Ramba Ral and the Black Tri-Stars. As the Earth Federation and Zeon forces teeter on the brink of war, the development of a groundbreaking weapon—the mobile suit—threatens to tip the scales. Witness the unfolding drama, political intrigue, and the path to the devastating One Year War in this captivating 13-episode series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
